metadata.title: CVE-2015-1433 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
program/lib/Roundcube/rcube_washtml.php in Roundcube before 1.0.5 does notproperly quote strings, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-sitescripting (XSS) attacks via the style attribute in an email.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
roundcube-core - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
roundcube-mysql - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
roundcube-pgsql - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
roundcube-plugins - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5+dfsg1-4.2').
